answers.answer: Hello,the only thing that can really help diabetic neuropathy is normalization of blood sugars.  Ie. getting blood sugars fasting to about 80-95 range and post eating always less than 140.If you could achieve this with meds and diet, then it will take about 6 - 18 months, but the neuropathy can be reversed.I recommend reading the book Diabetes Solutions by Dr. Richard Bernstein.  IF you can follow his advice exactly and gain blood sugar control, your situation may be able to improve your situation.
